comments:
RM->Validate on a JSP page. Validation worked fine, but saw these exceptions in the error log.

*** ERROR ***: Thu May 24 13:07:52 PDT 2007    java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.jst.jsf.validation.internal.JSPSemanticsValidator.validateFile(JSPSemanticsValidator.java:109)
at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.validation.JSPValidator.validate(JSPValidator.java:192)
at org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.validation.JSPValidator.validateInJob(JSPValidator.java:399)
at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.operations.ValidatorJob.run(ValidatorJob.java:65)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

DIAGNOSTIC

This appears to be due to a failure to load the JSP model. We are not checking correctly that the model manager returns non-null
Fix is extremely low risk and brings our null-protection in line with all other JSP validators.
+1. Please wait until RC1 is declared to release.
